headline.main: Top Israeli Rabbi Tells PM to Act Against US Anti-Semitism
headline.print_headline: Top Israeli Rabbi Tells PM to Act Against US Anti-Semitism

lead_paragraph: An Israeli chief rabbi on Monday implored Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to speak up about a recent wave of anti-Semitism and Jewish cemetery vandalism in the United States.
snippet: An Israeli chief rabbi on Monday implored Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to speak up about a recent wave of anti-Semitism and Jewish cemetery vandalism in the United States....
